title: Saint jon
author: Saint jon
content: I've been with crypto fund trader for 6 months now and I can't complain, everything is fine.But I see a lot of comments bad other companies and that's why I wanted to know your opinions.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: The cryptocurrency market is full of scammers, and it is difficult to find an honest company. Therefore, all prop firms are scams, and it is rare to find a reliable service, but most often they call them crypto signals, VIP signals, or any name to that effect, but they all agree that it is a service that provides you with paid predictions, which It is a scam due to the lack of regulations.Go to this board ----> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=57.0 share your ideas and analysis, and listen to the analyzes of others. You will get better results, almost for free.

comments.author: Timmzzy
comments.body: Quote from: Saint jon on October 27, 2023, 05:04:28 PMI've been with crypto fund trader for 6 months now and I can't complain, everything is fine.But I see a lot of comments bad other companies and that's why I wanted to know your opinions.In my thoughts I think we still have genuine prop firms out there but the bad eggs has ruined the good eggs, that's why this buddy said this The cryptocurrency market is full of scammers, and it is difficult to find an honest company And if you come to look at the internet now you will see thons of prop firm shading off the good ones you can't easily spot it. And if you do the URL will have some phishing links. Quote from: hugeblack on October 28, 2023, 12:06:36 PMThe cryptocurrency market is full of scammers, and it is difficult to find an honest company. Therefore, all prop firms are scams, and it is rare to find a reliable service, but most often they call them crypto signals, VIP signals, or any name to that effect, but they all agree that it is a service that provides you with paid predictions, which It is a scam due to the lack of regulations.Go to this board ----> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=57.0 share your ideas and analysis, and listen to the analyzes of others. You will get better results, almost for free.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Saint jon on October 27, 2023, 05:04:28 PMI've been with crypto fund trader for 6 months now and I can't complain, everything is fine.But I see a lot of comments bad other companies and that's why I wanted to know your opinions.Well trading isnt something safe so whats the ruckus about it. Some traders can always win and able to gain profits and some also loses daily and even bigger losing. Market is also about analysis its not just about buy low and sell high. In any case this isnt what happening right? Cause some buy lows and sold much lower due to panic or what.

comments.author: terrific
comments.body: Quote from: Saint jon on October 27, 2023, 05:04:28 PMI've been with crypto fund trader for 6 months now and I can't complain, everything is fine.But I see a lot of comments bad other companies and that's why I wanted to know your opinions.Are you for real with that and sure you're telling a true story? If you're doing good with that trader and you're making lots of money funding that trader for 6 months.Then, I'd say that good luck to your relationship and make each of you rich through funding and trading as a partnership. Because for me, it's rare to hear with these types of stories so, then that's it.

comments.author: synchronym
comments.body: If you trade a cryptocurrency for six months, you can actually lose some money and make a lot of money. Because we all know that keto currency trading is risky. Of course you need to be patient and trade long term in crypto currency. And if you get frustrated after six months of trading, then you will not have much success, you must be patient.

comments.author: borovichok
comments.body: Quote from: Saint jon on October 27, 2023, 05:04:28 PMI've been with crypto fund trader for 6 months now and I can't complain, everything is fine.But I see a lot of comments bad other companies and that's why I wanted to know your opinions.Reading both bad and good comments are fine, every trader have what's troubling him or her in the system and they tend to scout our chances of solving them with ease or complex efforts. Our opinions are merely suggestions which might turn out to helpful or not at the end of the day. We just have to do what we think is right for everyone of us to earn significant profits in the system. Prop firm accounts are not some random accoubt one will easily pick because it does belong to these crypto for Forex related companies that have divided the aspect of trading to become more simple and easy for upcoming trades specifically the ones that doesn't stand in good chance of Possessing good capital.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: Quote from: terrific on December 05, 2023, 09:48:14 AMQuote from: Saint jon on October 27, 2023, 05:04:28 PMI've been with crypto fund trader for 6 months now and I can't complain, everything is fine.But I see a lot of comments bad other companies and that's why I wanted to know your opinions.Are you for real with that and sure you're telling a true story? If you're doing good with that trader and you're making lots of money funding that trader for 6 months.Then, I'd say that good luck to your relationship and make each of you rich through funding and trading as a partnership. Because for me, it's rare to hear with these types of stories so, then that's it.I want to believe that the OP can be an exception of popular believe that crypto fund traders are scams, as we don't have any proof to doubt him. All I know is that almost everything that concerns cryptocurrency can be associated with scams, because it's mostly an unregulated industry where people can scam others and get away with it. I guess he's having a very good working relationship with his fund trader partnership that he's wondering about bad comments that he's hearing regarding other companies, I hope that comments on his topic has shown him that scams are real in crypto fund trading.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Kelward on December 25, 2023, 09:39:28 AMQuote from: terrific on December 05, 2023, 09:48:14 AMAre you for real with that and sure you're telling a true story? If you're doing good with that trader and you're making lots of money funding that trader for 6 months.Then, I'd say that good luck to your relationship and make each of you rich through funding and trading as a partnership. Because for me, it's rare to hear with these types of stories so, then that's it.I want to believe that the OP can be an exception of popular believe that crypto fund traders are scams, as we don't have any proof to doubt him. All I know is that almost everything that concerns cryptocurrency can be associated with scams, because it's mostly an unregulated industry where people can scam others and get away with it. I guess he's having a very good working relationship with his fund trader partnership that he's wondering about bad comments that he's hearing regarding other companies, I hope that comments on his topic has shown him that scams are real in crypto fund trading.OP is a shill himself. Do not be fooled by his innocent looking query. He is probably looking for a way to shill his “prop firm” which I am sure is a scam. Here is one of the threads where he tried to advertise it. He even has lots of alternate accounts doing the scam thing.Check this - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5473652.msg63137495#msg63137495

comments.author: Eldestyoung
comments.body: I don't really have experience with any prop firm but I have a friend who was trading with a prop firm, he bought his account and started trading, all his trade was going well, after the prop firm saw that he was doing pretty good, they came up with a principle that was not in the beginning and that's how they closed his account.So I don't really trust all this prop form companies
